Write-Up Text: A range of people have taken to social media to express their views on various topics including politics economics and social issues. Some are advocating for a raise in welfare payments highlighting the broken promises of the Labor party and accusing the previous LNP government of failing to address important issues like housing and homelessness. Others are discussing macroeconomic goals the federal budget surplus and the current electricity market prices across the National Electricity Market (NEM). Meanwhile tours of the courtyards of Parliament House in autumn colours are set to take place before the budget announcement.
